Spicy Mangos
Produced by KLab Cyscorpions

Games

About

Spicy Mangos is the brand of original games produced by KLab Cyscorpions. Formed in 2013, we are made up of a small team of developers and artists, specializing in mobile game development.

Whether you're a student looking to showcase your work, a professional looking to attract clients, or a graphic artist looking to share your projects, this template is the perfect starting point!

Contact Us


Location

3/F Bonifacio High Street Central (C2 Building) 7th Avenue Corner 29th Street Bonifacio Global City
Taguig, Metro Manila 1634

Ice Cream - Scoops Up

How many scoops can you stack?

Help Larry the Ice Cream Vendor to stack ice cream scoops as high as possible. But watch out; the higher it gets, the easier for them to fall down!

  • Genre: Stacker
  • Released: August 2014

Bloom

Fill the world with flowers!

Tap the screen to grow flowers. Fill the screen with blooming flowers while avoiding flying bullets and laser beams.

  • Genre: Casual
  • Released: April 2014

The Fort: Zombie Rush

You are a lone man in a sea of zombies. What’re you gonna do?

Defend your ground against hordes of zombies, using whatever weapons are available.

  • Genre: Shooter
  • Released: December 2013

GRAV

The power of gravity is in your hands.

Shoot gravity wells to manipulate platforms and solve multiple puzzle-filled levels!

  • Genre: Puzzle Platformer
  • Released: November 2013

Red's Revenge

The Big Bad Wolf ate Little Red Riding Hood’s Grandma. It’s now time for revenge!

Shoot, and throw knives at the wolf while chasing him through forests and deserts. Defeat him and retrieve grandma’s body parts!

  • Genre: Action
  • Released: September 2013
